lines.line: What could you want with an old woman like me?
I am in search of a quest.
Hmmm... Maybe I can think of something for you.
Would you like to become more proficient in the dark arts?
Yes, help me become one with my darker side.
Okay, I'm going to make a potion to help bring out your darker self.
You will need certain ingredients.
What do I need?
You need an eye of newt, a rat's tail, an onion... Oh and a piece of burnt meat.
Great, I'll go and get them.
No, I have my principles and honour.
Suit yourself, but you're missing out.
I've heard that you are a witch.
Yes it does seem to be getting fairly common knowledge.
I fear I may be getting a visit from the witch hunters of Falador before long.
Goodbye.
I've been looking for those ingredients.
So what have you found so far?
I'm afraid I don't have any of them yet.
Well I can't make the potion without them! Remember... You need an eye of newt, a rat's tail, an onion, and a piece of burnt meat. Off you go dear!
I have the rat's tail (ewww), I don't have any burnt meat, I don't have an onion, and I don't have an eye of newt.
I don't have a rat's tail, I have the burnt meat, I don't have an onion, and I don't have an eye of newt.
I don't have a rat's tail, I don't have any burnt meat, I have an onion, and I don't have an eye of newt.
I don't have a rat's tail, I don't have any burnt meat, I don't have an onion, and I have the eye of newt, yum!

I don't have a rat's tail, I have the burnt meat, I have an onion, and I have the eye of newt, yum!
Great, but I'll need the other ingredients as well.
In fact I have everything!
Excellent, can I have them then?
Well, is it ready?
Ok, now drink from the cauldron.
Well are you going to drink the potion or not?
Yes, I will.

characters.name: Hetty
characters.description: Elderly female, British accent, raspy and mysterious tone, a reclusive witch living in Rimmington who dabbles in the dark arts and takes pride in her craft while remaining wary of witch hunters.
